description: Main entry point for a Flutter app that previews HTML/CSS/JS assets inside a WebView. It defines app initialization, a list of HTML screen routes, and the main widget structure.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application, configuring theme, routes, and building the home page.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that enables web contents debugging and runs the MyApp widget.
